review: Love the firestick once we figured out how to hook it up.  It seemed easy, but when we hooked the stick directly into our older Sony Bravia flat screen HDTV, we had picture but no sound.  After adjusting audio within the TV and the firestick settings, still no luck.  Finally, we used the USB adapter included with the firestick and that was all we needed.  We get a great picture on our tv and have no problem receiving the wireless signal in our bedroom, which is upstairs and a fair distance from our router. The only downside so far is that we are having problems getting Netflix to work properly.  We keep getting an error message saying that Netflix is not installed, etc. It IS installed. We also just ordered the fire tv box for our living room and same problem there.  I have read all of the suggestions for fixes and clearing the cache in Netflix app, forcing stop and restarting, it works for a bit, but is not dependable.  I have yet to have it work on the firestick (a week now). Not sure if this is totally a Netflix app problem or if there are problems with Amazon and Netflix compatibility.  I just wish they would figure it out and give us a fix.  We did away with DISH and are relying on Amazon Prime, Netflix, Hulu and an antenna for our TV. We are relying on Netflix for a bulk of our entertainment.  Come on Amazon.....lets make this right. Have no problem with HULU or Amazon Prime.playing.
